no-truncate.name: no-truncate

commands.description: Submit a new job to lab-exchange

force.name: force
force.description: Force submit job (if false, will prompt for confirmation)

password.name: password
password.description: Wallet password (if not supplied, will prompt for password)

jobPrice.name: jobPrice
jobPrice.description: Price you will pay for the job (in gwei). If not specified, the default price will be used.

args.name: request
args.description: Job request JSON file (local path, IPFS path, or IPFS CID)
